item.title: How I built this blog
item.description: haha Material Used : https://tclavelle.github.io/blog/blogdown_github/ https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/github-pages.html *https://talesofr.wordpress.com/2017/08/18/starting-a-rmarkdown-blog-with-bookdown-hugo-github/ How to 1 create 2 repo username/source username/username.github.io 2 clone repo on computer and remove readme files 2 start new R project 3 project option -> website, select source as base directory 4 load necessary libraries # Load blogdown package and install Hugo library(blogdown) install_hugo() 5 choose a theme 6 set “source” as working directory 7 create site # Create new site in our recently cloned blogdown repository new_site(theme = "kakawait/hugo-tranquilpeak-theme", format = 'toml') 8 add folowing lines in config.
